Text.Page:
These Scions of Lok aren't fools. Weâ€”I underestimated them badly. Between the orcans to harass us and the kumases and nagas to keep us at bay, they've done too damned well.

If you could kill more of the nagas, that might give us the chance to take the initiative for once. Take the field and slay several {@LinkCreature:7#23#juggernaut mercenaries}. That ought to get their attention.

With those nagas dead, the cultists are vulnerable. I just wish more of my troops were alive to take advantage of it.

Still, you did good work. Thanks, .
